pageProduct.name: Oral B Gum Care & Sensitivity Repair Toothpaste 110g
pageProduct.description:
Information

The Oral-B Gum Care range promotes healthy gums by fighting plaque bacteria along the gumline and slowing its re-growth. It uses ActivRepair Technology, which is a gentle antibacterial formula, defending from bacteria and actively revitalising your gums. The Active Repair Technology also has strengthening action on enamel, creating a shield against acid erosion and actively restoring weakened enamel.

General Information

Oral-B Gum Care & Sensitivity Repair Toothpaste helps revitalise gums & restores enamel in 2 weeks*. #1 Toothbrush brand used by dentists worldwide. Relieves sensitivity pain and revitalises your gums.

It promotes healthy gums by fighting plaque bacteria along the gumline and slowing its re-growth. Forming a therapeutic layer around the tooth to repair painful sensitivity. Prevents future causes of sensitivity.

*in laboratory tests on weakened enamel

Size: 110g

Fragrance: Gentle Mint

Scent: Gentle Mint

KEY FEATURES

• Relieves sensitivity pain and revitalises your gums
• Builds a therapeutic layer that blocks micro-channels with the first brushing
• With continued use, builds increasing protection against future cause of tooth sensitivity
• Gentle mint flavour

Warnings

Caution: Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 12 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor. If sensitivity symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 12 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor. If sensitivity symptoms persists, consult your healthcare professional.

Ingredients

Contains 1450 ppm Fluoride. Contains Sodium Saccharin.
INGREDIENTS: Glycerol, Silicon Dioxide, Sodium Polymetaphosphate, Propylene Glycol, Macrogol 300, Water-purified, Zinc Lactate, Flavour, Stannous Fluoride, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Chondrus Crispus, Sodium Phosphate-tribasic, Xanthan Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Carnauba Wax, Pigment blue 15 CI 74160

Contains: Contains 1450ppm Fluoride. Contains Sodium Saccharin.

Directions

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist. Make sure to brush all sensitive areas of the teeth for at least 30 seconds.

USAGE ADVICE

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist. Make sure to brush all sensitive areas of the teeth for at least 30 seconds.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Tube has been foil sealed for your protection. Do not use if seal on tube is broken or missing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.
